attributes.action: Ban the Sale and Display of Christmas Items until 1st December
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see the sale and display of christmas items banned from high streets and media until 1st of December. It's not that I don't like christmas, I have three girls after all it's the fact that by the time it gets to christmas everyone is so sick of it and can't wait for it to end, The spirit of christmas no longer exist's.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
